lead_paragraph: The van’s owner was charged with a felony, but the Police Department’s chief spokesman said officers should have acted more quickly to investigate.
snippet: The van’s owner was charged with a felony, but the Police Department’s chief spokesman said officers should have acted more quickly to investigate.

headline.main: Police Say Placard Misled Them Into Overlooking a Suspect Van in Times Square
headline.seo: Placard Led New York Police to Ignore Van in Times Square
headline.print_headline: Police Say Placard Misled Them Into Overlooking a Suspect Van in Times Square
